name: love
example: Love life; live long.

name: all
example: You all take care of yourselves.

name: know
example: I would like to say to the victim's family, if this goes on record, that I know they have gotten grief and I know with this execution, it will not be any relief to them.

name: family
example: I have a good family, just like you are a good family.

name: thank
example: Thank you Heavenly Father for getting me off of death row and for bringing me home out of prison.

name: sorry
example: But I'm sorry that I wasn't the one that did it or anything.

name: want
example: I wanted to let you know that the Lord Jesus is my life and I just want to go.

name: like
example: I would like to offer up my death for the conversion of sinners on Death Row.

name: god
example: I am so glad I found God and I am so happy for it.

name: say
example: I have said from the beginning and I will say it again that I am innocent.

name: just
example: Those investigators were just trying to convict somebody.

name: hope
example: I hope you can get some peace tonight.

name: forgive
example: I forgive all of you – hope God forgives all of you too.

name: life
example: I have committed lots of sin in my life, but I am not guilty of this crime.

name: lord
example: Jesus Christ is the Lord of Lords and the King of Kings.

name: people
example: Well, I just wanted to ask people to pray for two families: my family and the family of Officer McCarthy.

name: take
example: Lord, take me home with you. Amen.

name: tell
example: Tell Mom I hove her.

name: see
example: And to my family, I love you and I will see you all in Heaven.

name: peace
example: "I am at peace; we know what it is."

name: here
example: During my time here, I have been treated well by all T.D.C. personnel.

name: jesus
example: Jesus, take me home.

name: pain
example: I have no pain and no guilt.

name: death
example: I don't fear death.

name: ask
example: I asked the Lord to have mercy on me and I hope He has mercy on these people carrying out this mass slaughter.

name: give
example: Give us this day our daily bread.

name: keep
example: Sis, Cynthia, and Sandy, keep on going and it will be O.K.

name: strong
example: I am not strong enough to ask for forgiveness because I don't if I am worth.

name: out
example: I am out of here.

name: go
example: Go ahead, I'm finished.

name: heart
example: I would like you to reach down in your hearts and forgive me.

name: father
example: Help them, Father, to find it in their hearts, not for my sake , but for yours, and their sake to, Father, find it in their heart to forgive me for what I have done.

name: years
example: Through the years of being in prison I come to hear and respect our life.

name: find
example: I cannot find the words to express the sadness I feel for bringing this hurt and pain on my loved ones.

name: friends
example: Goodbye to all my friends; be cool.

name: man
example: This stuff stings, man almighty.

name: when
example: Mommy I will be home when I get there.

name: right
example: Amen All right Warden, let's give them what they want.

name: being
example: I am being real with the real.

name: come
example: We come to understand what is finite and what is infinite.

name: please
example: Please let me know.

name: ready
example: I'm ready Warden, send me home.

name: let
example: Don't let them ever forget me.

name: stay
example: I wanted to wait for a thirty day stay for a DNA test so you know who did the crime.

name: now
example: Now all you all are seeing in the process a perfect example of ol’ freaky deaky Bill Clinton when he signed that anti-terrorism law to shorten the appeals.

name: care
example: Father I commend my soul, please take care and watch everybody I leave behind.

name: pray
example: I pray you find the peace through salvation.

name: forgiveness
example: I won't ask for your forgiveness.

name: always
example: My truth will always be my truth.

name: caused
example: Stay out of crime; there is no point in it.

name: time
example: Thirteen or fourteen years ago, I had a non-caring attitude at the time.

name: back
example: I wish I could bring them back, but I can't.

name: never
example: I never claimed to be the best person.

name: I'll
example: I'll see you all.

name: way
example: just hope that in some kind of way that ya'll can move on and find peace in your life.

name: christ
example: Jesus Christ is my Lord and Savior and I want him to be yours.

name: mom
example: Hi, Mom.

name: warden
example: O.K., Warden, roll 'em.

name: too
example: Go ahead Warden. I love you, love you too.

name: innocent
example: You're gonna stop killing innocent kids, murdering young kids.

name: only
example: God is the only one that is perfect.

name: good
example: I have a good family, just like you are a good family.

name: home
example: Kick the tires and light the fire, I am going home to see my son and my mom, I love you and God Bless you.

name: Allah
example: I know Allah will forgive me, Allah is the forgiver.

name: sir
example: Thank you, sir.

name: apologize
example: I wasn't going to apologize by letter, I wanted to apologize face to face.

name: heaven
example: I am going to be free, I am going to Heaven.

name: today
example: Only the sky and the green grass goes on forever and today is a good day to die.

name: very
example: As I have said from the very first thing, I am innocent of this crime and God knows I am innocent and the four people that was murdered know I am innocent and when I get to heaven I'll be hunting you and we'll talk.

name: lot
example: You have a lot of work left to do.

name: make
example: You all brought me here to be executed, not to make a speech.

name: I've
example: I've done time with.

name: may
example: To the victim's family, may you be at peace also.

name: row
example: Why do I say this, the Death Row is full of isolated hearts and suppressed minds.

name: day
example: Rebecca, I understand that you wanted this day to come, you got what you wanted.

name: much
example: We have so much to give when we give out of our hearts.

name: sister
example: Ashanti Chimurenga, I love you for standing with me, my sister. You are a strong warrior queen.

name: world
example: Let the world see the barbarity and injustice of what is really happening here.

name: hate
example: I have no hate toward humanity.

name: support
example: I want to thank my family for their help and moral support and for their struggle.

name: kill
example: You can kill a revolutionary, but you cannot stop the revolution.

name: bless
example: God bless you all.

name: really
example: A lot of people say I didn't commit those murders, I really did it.

name: wish
example: Not one day has passed that I wish I could take it back.

name: victims
example: To the victims again, I hate the way all of this happened to ya'll.

name: things
example: I am sorry I put you through some things that I can't take back.

name: continue
example: Stay strong, continue to fight.

name: still
example: I love you too Uncle Kyle; I am still your nephew, no matter what you believe.

name: how
example: I have said in interviews, if you want to hurt me and choke me, that's how terrible I felt before this crime.

name: appreciate
example: I appreciate all the good and bad times together.

name: thing
example: The only thing I want to say is that I appreciate the hospitality that you guys have shown me and the respect; and the last meal was really good.

name: truly
example: I truly believe that Jesus died for my sins that I may be resurrected, Lord, that you would do that much.

name: brother
example: You are great people. To my brothers on Death Row.

name: mr
example: If you look at the transcripts, I didn't kill Mr. Newman and I didn't rob your house.

name: must
example: I ain't left yet, must be a miracle.

name: ok
example: I'll be O.K.

name: son
example: But my death doesn't bring your son back - it doesn't bring closure.

name: feel
example: I feel that I have to speak out against the practice of the death penalty, although I have no regrets in my case.

name: brothers
example: All of the brothers on the row stay strong.

name: think
example: Think about it before you make a bad decision.
